summary: Completed comprehensive testing of the new Platform Overview section that replaced the Crypto Dashboard. All required elements are present and functioning correctly. The two-column layout with sticky left column, dashboard with statistics cards, mini-charts, service modules, and bottom statistics are all working perfectly. Mobile responsiveness is excellent.

ui_bugs.issue: Sticky behavior not working correctly - column moves too much when scrolling

Left column: 'INSIDE THE PLATFORM' badge displaying correctly
Left column: Platform title 'A command center for your crypto journey' present
Left column: Platform description text displaying correctly
Left column: Numbered services list with 3 items (01, 02, 03)
Service items: '01 OTC & P2P MARKETS', '02 EARLY LAND ACCESS', '03 ANALYTICS & SENTIMENT'
Right column: Dashboard container with proper styling and layout
Dashboard header with 'FOMO Platform' branding and logo
Mini-navigation with 4 items: Dashboard, History, Alerts, Portfolio
Navigation items are clickable and interactive
Statistics cards grid with 4 cards displaying correctly
Statistics cards: Community Members (45,658), Monthly Visits (1.2M), Tracked Projects (16,670), Red Flag Alerts (892)
Mini-charts present in all 4 statistics cards with proper SVG visualization
Our Services section with 8 service modules
Service modules: Dashboard, OTC Market, P2P Exchange, Predictions, Parsing, Sentiment, EarlyLand, NFT Strategy
Module cards are hoverable and interactive
Bottom statistics section with 3 key metrics
Bottom stats: '70% ANALYSIS AUTOMATED', '24/7 MARKET COVERAGE', '$50M+ TRADING VOLUME'
Mobile responsiveness - layout adapts correctly to mobile viewport (390px)

All interactive elements work on mobile devices
Desktop layout maintains proper two-column structure
All required elements present and accessible via CSS selectors
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix sticky behavior for the left column (.platform-description) - it should stay in position when scrolling rather than moving with the scroll. The CSS position: sticky with top: 100px should be properly implemented.
